short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that plugs into your CRM of choice to display Toplyne stats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toplyne‚Äôs Chrome Extension lets you access critical intelligence and insights (based on first-party data and third-party enrichment) about your users and accounts from within your CRM.

‚ú¥Ô∏è Why Toplyne?

Toplyne is the leading predictive AI for sales and marketing teams. Toplyne‚Äôs AI predicts new customers, expansion sales, cross-sells, customers at risk, and more by learning from your customer data.
